steps.name: I am on the xe landing page
Verified the URL page is "https://www.xe.com/"
I enter "abc" in the "Amount" field
Verified convert module UI of the page
I am on the xe landing page

elements.name: Convert currency with different currency pairs

steps.name: Verified the URL page is "https://www.xe.com/"
I select "FromCurrency" and type "EUR" to the field
I select "ToCurrency" and type "USD" to the field
I enter "100" in the "Amount" field
I click on the "Convert" button
I should see the converted amount in the "Result" field
I am on the xe landing page

elements.name: Test invalid amount input on amount field

steps.name: Verified the URL page is "https://www.xe.com/"
I select "FromCurrency" and type "SGD" to the field
I select "ToCurrency" and type "MYR" to the field
I enter "abc" in the "Amount" field
I check "Convert" button is available or not
I check the "error" message
I am on the xe landing page

elements.name: Test invalid amount input on amount field

steps.name: Verified the URL page is "https://www.xe.com/"
I select "FromCurrency" and type "USD" to the field
I select "ToCurrency" and type "EUR" to the field
I enter "-100" in the "Amount" field
I check "Convert" button is available or not
I check the "error" message
I am on the xe landing page

elements.name: Test Large amount of convert currency

steps.name: Verified the URL page is "https://www.xe.com/"
I select "FromCurrency" and type "SGD" to the field
I select "ToCurrency" and type "MYR" to the field
I enter "100000000000" in the "Amount" field
I click on the "Convert" button
I should see the converted amount in the "Result" field
I am on the xe landing page

elements.name: Test Large amount of convert currency

steps.name: Verified the URL page is "https://www.xe.com/"

elements.name: Test input behavior if enter more than two decimal number in amount field after dot Example: 12345.5678

steps.name: Verified the URL page is "https://www.xe.com/"
I select "FromCurrency" and type "USD" to the field
I select "ToCurrency" and type "MYR" to the field
I enter "123.450000" in the "Amount" field
I click on the "Convert" button
I should see the converted amount in the "Result" field
I check back the "Amount" field value for correction value
I am on the xe landing page
